ExtendedReset.description: This action performs an extended chassis reset action.
ExtendedReset.longDescription: This action performs a chassis reset. It let's the user set the targeted power state after the reset is completed.

FinalPowerState.description: This parameter shall contain the final power state of the system. In case the parameter is not provided, the system will be set to the power 'Off' state by default.
FinalPowerState.longDescription: This parameter shall contain the final power state of the system.

ResetType.longDescription: This parameter shall contain the type of reset.

enumDescriptions.ActiveSensingMode: Air filter monitoring mode is Active Sensing mode.
enumDescriptions.CountDownMode: Air filter monitoring mode is CountDown mode.

enumLongDescriptions.Off: This value shall indicate the resource will transition to a power off state. The transition will start immediately. Upon successful completion, the PowerState property, if supported, shall contain the value `Off`.
enumLongDescriptions.On: This value shall indicate the resource will transition to a power on state. Upon successful completion, the PowerState property, if supported, shall contain the value `On`.

enumDescriptions.Blinking: This value shall represent the Indicator LED is in a blinking state where the LED is being turned on and off in repetition
enumDescriptions.Lit: This value shall represent the Indicator LED is in a solid on state.
enumDescriptions.Off: This value shall represent the Indicator LED is in a solid off state.

enumDescriptions.All: This enum is used clear all metrics data from SystemBoardPwrConsumption, PowerHeadroom, SystemBoardCurrentConsumption sensors.
enumDescriptions.CumulativePowerAndTime: This enum is used clear Culmative Power and Time metrics data from SystemBoardPwrConsumption, PowerHeadroom, SystemBoardCurrentConsumption sensors.
enumDescriptions.PeakAndCumulativeValue: This enum is used clear  peak and cumulative metrics data from SystemBoardPwrConsumption, PowerHeadroom, SystemBoardCurrentConsumption sensors.
enumDescriptions.PeakValueAndTime: This enum is used clear Culmative Peak value and Time metrics data from SystemBoardPwrConsumption, PowerHeadroom, SystemBoardCurrentConsumption sensors.

enumLongDescriptions.All: This enum is used clear clear all metrics data from SystemBoardPwrConsumption, PowerHeadroom, SystemBoardCurrentConsumption sensors.
enumLongDescriptions.CumulativePowerAndTime: This enum is used clear Culmative Power and Time metrics data from SystemBoardPwrConsumption, PowerHeadroom, SystemBoardCurrentConsumption sensors.
enumLongDescriptions.PeakAndCumulativeValue: This enum is used clear clear all metrics data from SystemBoardPwrConsumption, PowerHeadroom, SystemBoardCurrentConsumption sensors.
enumLongDescriptions.PeakValueAndTime: This enum is used clear Culmative Peak value and Time metrics data from SystemBoardPwrConsumption, PowerHeadroom, SystemBoardCurrentConsumption sensors.

ResetFilterLife.description: This action is used to reset Bezel air filter.
ResetFilterLife.longDescription: This action shall perform reset of Bezel air filter.

enumDescriptions.PowerCycle: Power cycle the unit. Behaves like a full power removal, followed by a power restore to the resource.

enumLongDescriptions.PowerCycle: This value shall indicate the resource will perform a power cycle. Resource needs to in power off state to perform full power removal follwed by power restore to the resource.

SetLEDStatus.description: This action performs an extended Set Chassis LED Status.
SetLEDStatus.longDescription: This action performs a Set Chassis LED Status.

FaultLED.description: The property shall represent the Chassis Fault LED .
FaultLED.longDescription: The property shall represent the Chassis Fault LED.

IdentificationLED.description: The property shall represent the Chassis Identification LED.
IdentificationLED.longDescription: The property shall represent the Chassis Identification LED.

SetPSUConfiguration.longDescription: This action performs a chassis Set PSUConfiguration.

RedundantPSUCount.longDescription: Set number of redundant PSUs for the system

RequiredPSUCount.longDescription: Set number of PSUs required for the system to operate in a normal condition.
